net.bytebuddy.implementation

Class Forwarding

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.implementation.Forwarding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstrumentedType.Prepareable, Implementation

    public class Forwarding
extends Object
implements Implementation
    This implementation forwards method invocations to another instance. For this, the intercepted method must be defined on a super type of the given delegation target. Static methods cannot be forwarded as they are not invoked on an instance.
    See Also:
    MethodDelegation

    • Method Detail

      • to

        public static Implementation to(Object delegate)
        Forwards all intercepted method invocations to the given instance which is stored in a static field of the instrumented class. The field name is generated from the instance's hash code.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate to which all intercepted methods should be forwarded.
        Returns:
        A corresponding implementation.

      • to

        public static Implementation to(Object delegate,
                                String fieldName)
        Forwards all intercepted method invocations to the given instance which is stored in a static field of the instrumented class.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate to which all intercepted methods should be forwarded.
        fieldName - The name of the field in which the delegate should be stored.
        Returns:
        A corresponding implementation.

      • toStaticField

        public static Implementation toStaticField(String fieldName,
                                           Type fieldType)
        Forwards all intercepted method invocations to a static field of the instrumented class. The value of this field must be set explicitly.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the field in which the delegate should be stored.
        fieldType - The type of the field and thus the type of which the delegate is assumed to be of.
        Returns:
        A corresponding implementation.

      • appender

        public ByteCodeAppender appender(Implementation.Target implementationTarget)
        Description copied from interface: Implementation
        Creates a byte code appender that determines the implementation of the instrumented type's methods.
        Specified by:
        appender in interface Implementation
        Parameters:
        implementationTarget - The target of the current implementation.
        Returns:
        A byte code appender for implementing methods delegated to this implementation. This byte code appender is also responsible for handling methods that were added by this implementation on the call to InstrumentedType.Prepareable.prepare(InstrumentedType).

      • prepare

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The prepared instrumented type.
